Reviews.Title: SWEET DEAL-GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Alina C. Green
Reviews.Content: I am a volunteer photographer for a website called "Find A Grave", a virtual cemetery with world-wide membership. My old camera was a bit heavy, and acting up. With the sun down here in Florida, I have to hold an umbrella to take the shot sometimes. So, I needed something lightweight, with different settings, and no batteries. I thought it was a TALL order, but then I found this little beauty together with all the wonderful accessories, I put it first on my Wish List, and purchased it when it was reduced to only $129.95!...(thanks to an email from Amazon). This little jewel is almost 1/4" thick, SUPER lightweight, and has settings for color, black/white, sepia, and mixed. Just the other day, I received an additional battery pack. No batteries, just charge the camera and go. The film feature has audio! I am also known as 'Paparazzi Grandma' so, you know I am going to have fun, too!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: Really great camera for Hawaii - my only dismay was not being able to make it do actual landscape photos- the long long ones, you know. It would go through the process fine, but when trying to recall images, those landscape ones were never there. good quality, great assortment of things and so lightweight. Plus- purple!

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier
Reviews.Author: phire
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter and she absolutely loves!! The pictures are mega awesome, her words. She's happy, I'm happy

Reviews.Title: i was loking for a camera for my wife that was easy to use.i looked at alot of cameras and kept coming back to this one.
Reviews.Author: jerry james
Reviews.Content: this camera is very easy to use.it has everything you need to take good quality pictures.anyone looking for a easy to use and everything you need in one package this is the camera for you.we love it.

Reviews.Title: Happy Birthday
Reviews.Author: C. S. Nolan "wisdom seeker"
Reviews.Content: I wanted to give my older sister a camera.  That is a long store, but she was so delighted with her new camera.I researched all types of this camera and this one has the greatest number of pixelsBuy it for yourself or give it to someone you love
